meanings.sent1: The sugar was fermentable, so it turned into alcohol.
meanings.sent2: The yeast quickly consumed the fermentable sugars in the mixture.
meanings.sent3: The fermentable dough bubbled and rose like magic in the oven.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were fermentable, sparking creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The fermentable grapes transformed into a rich, flavorful wine.

meanings.sent1: The fermentable grains were used to make beer.
meanings.sent2: The fermentable material was left to ferment for several days.
meanings.sent3: The fermentable solution bubbled happily in the fermentation tank.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm was fermentable, spreading to everyone around him.
